Music Signal Processing¶

Magenta¶

This file contains the details of Music Signal Processing Experiments with Magenta. Currently, I am divinding it into 2 parts

  • Reproduce the experiments for Western Music. There is a tutorial available for Music Generation Using RNNs As of now, the only thing that the system accepts is the MIDI files
  • Try to run the same experiments on Indian Music.

MIDI and Ardour¶

  • Ardour tutorial is available here and here
  • Ardour is a professional digital workstation for working with audio and MIDI.
